sentences.en: ‘Is she going?’ ‘That's just it—she can't make up her mind.’.
sentences.cn: “她去吗？”“那正是问题所在——她拿不定主意。”。

sentences.en: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.cn: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.cn: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentences.cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
sentences.cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
sentences.cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

sentences.en: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: It shows a fox being disembowelled by a pack of hounds.
sentences.cn: 画面中一只狐狸正被一群猎狗撕咬得肠子外流。

sentences.en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: okay, that's it, you've cried long enough.
sentences.cn: 好了，你已经哭得够久的了。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
sentences.cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

sentences.en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
sentences.cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

sentences.en: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.cn: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.en: this is it—the big sale.
sentences.cn: 快了——就要大甩卖了。

sentences.en: this is it, I'm going.
sentences.cn: 好了，我就要走了。

sentences.en: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.cn: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

phrases.tran_cn: 可以说是，似乎就是；好像
这正是要点；这正是问题所在

trans.tran_cn: <美俚>傻瓜，笨蛋，<俚>绝妙的人，理想的东西，登峰造极
它，他，正好是所需的，事实[情况]
trans.tran_en: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about
